entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -33.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
